article_title: ELECTION PREVIEW: Conservative Republicans spar for U.S. Senate seat

article_metadata.author:
MAUREEN HAYDEN
CNHI State Reporter

og.description: INDIANAPOLIS — Two Republican contenders for the state's open U.S. Senate seat are getting a new appreciation for all of Indiana's 36,418 square miles.
